Planning Board Meeting

Mayor Steglik, Deputy Mayor Catalan-Culnan, and Township Council welcome you to the Mount Laurel Township website!

Our website is designed to be easily accessible and helpful. Events and meeting dates are displayed right on our home page in the news article section and event calendars. Find forms relating to zoning, planning, pavilion rentals and more on the "online forms" tab. Keep up to date on the latest Township news by signing up for E-Notify alerts.
